no_devices:
No devices found.
Connect a device via USB or enter an IP address.

video_settings.max_size_tooltip: Limits the maximum width or height of the video. 0 = no limit
video_settings.bit_rate_tooltip: Video bitrate in bits per second. Higher bitrate = better quality, but more traffic
video_settings.max_fps_tooltip: Limits the frame rate. 0 = no limit. Higher FPS = smoother video, but more load
video_settings.codec_tooltip: h264 - compatible, h265 - efficient, av1 - new standard
video_settings.encoder_tooltip: Force use of a specific encoder (e.g.: 'OMX.google.h264.encoder')

audio_settings.codec_tooltip: opus - efficient, aac - compatible, raw - uncompressed
audio_settings.bit_rate_tooltip: Audio bitrate in bits per second. 0 = automatic selection
audio_settings.buffer_size_tooltip: Audio buffer size in milliseconds. Larger = more stable, but more delay

display_settings.rotation_tooltip: Rotates the device image by the specified angle
display_settings.crop_tooltip: Crops the screen area. Format: width:height:x:y (e.g.: 800:600:100:50)
display_settings.always_on_top_tooltip: scrcpy window will always be on top of other windows
display_settings.window_title_tooltip: scrcpy window title. Leave empty for default title

control_settings.show_touches_tooltip: Shows visual touch indicators on the device screen
control_settings.stay_awake_tooltip: Prevents automatic screen turn-off on the device
control_settings.turn_screen_off_tooltip: Turns off the device screen when starting scrcpy (saves battery)
control_settings.keyboard_tooltip: SDK - standard mode, AOA - Android Open Accessory, HID - physical keyboard emulation
control_settings.mouse_tooltip: SDK - standard mode, AOA - Android Open Accessory, HID - physical mouse emulation
control_settings.gamepad_tooltip: Enables gamepad support (PS4/PS5, Xbox, etc.) for device control
control_settings.prefer_text_tooltip: Improves Cyrillic and other character input (SDK mode only)
control_settings.raw_key_events_tooltip: Sends raw key events instead of text (alternative to 'Prefer text')
control_settings.no_key_repeat_tooltip: Disables key repeat events when holding a key (useful for games)
control_settings.forward_all_clicks_tooltip: Forwards all mouse clicks to the device, disabling standard actions (BACK, HOME)
control_settings.legacy_paste_tooltip: Uses old text paste method (works better on some devices)

record_settings.enable_record_tooltip: Enables device screen recording to file
record_settings.record_file_tooltip: Path to the file where the screen recording will be saved
record_settings.format_tooltip: mp4 - compatible format, mkv - more flexible
record_settings.time_limit_tooltip: Maximum recording duration in seconds. 0 = no limit

advanced_settings.otg_tooltip: OTG mode: simulates physical keyboard and mouse connected to the device
advanced_settings.disable_screensaver_tooltip: Disables computer screensaver during scrcpy operation
advanced_settings.power_off_on_close_tooltip: Turns off the device when closing scrcpy
advanced_settings.power_on_tooltip: Turns on the device when starting scrcpy (if it's off)
advanced_settings.start_fps_tooltip: Initial frame rate on startup. 0 = automatic selection
advanced_settings.display_id_tooltip: Display ID for mirroring (0 = main display)
advanced_settings.tcpip_tooltip: IP address and port for Wi-Fi connection (e.g.: 192.168.1.100:5555)
advanced_settings.shortcut_mod_tooltip: Modifiers for hotkeys (lctrl, rctrl, lalt, ralt, lsuper, rsuper)

shortcuts.title: Hotkeys
shortcuts.mod_info:
MOD = modifier (default: Left Ctrl or Super)
Can be changed in 'Advanced' settings ‚Üí 'Hotkey modifiers'
shortcuts.mouse_info:
Additional mouse actions:
‚Ä¢ Double-click left mouse button - remove black bars
‚Ä¢ Middle mouse click - press HOME
‚Ä¢ Right mouse click - press BACK (or turn on screen)
‚Ä¢ 4th mouse button - press APP_SWITCH
‚Ä¢ 5th mouse button - expand notifications panel
‚Ä¢ Double-click 5th button - expand settings panel

Notes:
‚Ä¢ All Ctrl+key combinations are sent to the device
‚Ä¢ Clipboard functions work only on Android 7+

language_settings.title: Interface language:
language_settings.restart_info: Note: Language change will take effect after restarting the application.

messages.camera_already_running: Camera for device {device_id} is already running! Stop the previous session first.
messages.high_speed_fps_warning: For high-speed recording, select FPS of at least 120.
messages.restart_required: Restart the application to apply changes.
messages.app_will_close: The application will be closed to apply changes.

camera_settings.title: Camera Settings
camera_settings.refresh_cameras_tooltip: Updates the list of available cameras on the device
camera_settings.camera_tooltip: Select camera to use (0 - main, 1 - front)
camera_settings.aspect_ratio_tooltip: Frame aspect ratio (sensor - by sensor, 4:3 - classic, 16:9 - widescreen, 1:1 - square)
camera_settings.no_audio_tooltip: Disables audio for camera (recommended for Windows)
camera_settings.v4l2_info: üí° For V4L2 setup, the 'Setup V4L2' button will load the kernel module and create virtual devices
camera_settings.v4l2_enabled_tooltip: Enables V4L2 mode to use camera as webcam
camera_settings.v4l2_size_info: Size will be automatically determined by scrcpy
camera_settings.v4l2_fps_info: FPS will be automatically determined by scrcpy
camera_settings.v4l2_buffers_tooltip: Number of buffers for V4L2 device
camera_settings.v4l2_no_playback_tooltip: Disables local video playback (recommended for V4L2)

camera_messages.no_device_selected: No device selected for getting camera list
camera_messages.select_camera_first: Please select a camera before starting!
camera_messages.v4l2_unavailable_windows: V4L2 is not available on Windows!
camera_messages.v4l2_not_enabled: V4L2 is not enabled! First enable the 'Enable V4L2' checkbox.
camera_messages.v4l2_setup_success:
V4L2 module successfully loaded with OBS support!

{devices}

Now you can:
‚Ä¢ Use Android camera as webcam
‚Ä¢ Add to OBS as 'Video Capture Device' (select {device})
‚Ä¢ Use in Zoom, Teams, browsers
camera_messages.v4l2_module_not_found: v4l2loopback module not found. Install: sudo apt install v4l2loopback-dkms
camera_messages.v4l2_ctl_not_found: v4l2loopback-ctl not found. Install: sudo apt install v4l2loopback-utils
camera_messages.v4l2_utils_not_found: v4l2-ctl not found. Install: sudo apt install v4l-utils
camera_messages.v4l2_front_camera_warning:
‚ö†Ô∏è Front camera (ID: {camera_id}) may not support V4L2!

Recommendations:
‚Ä¢ Use main (rear) camera for V4L2
‚Ä¢ Front cameras often have limited capabilities
‚Ä¢ If errors occur, try another camera
camera_messages.v4l2_low_resolution_warning:
‚ö†Ô∏è Camera (ID: {camera_id}) has low resolution: {resolution}

Recommendations:
‚Ä¢ For V4L2, 1280x720 or higher resolution is recommended
‚Ä¢ Low resolution may cause V4L2 problems
‚Ä¢ Try another camera with better resolution
camera_messages.v4l2_test_error:
Failed to get V4L2 device information:
{error}
